During the financial year 2015-16 application was submitted to Maharashtra Government for running a library. But grant was not received in the said financial year as per the policy of the Government. However, through public subscription and participation of the public, library is started. Blood Donation Camp was also organized. Medical check up Seminar was organized for all the ailments. Guidance for M.P.S.C. and other competition exams is made available free of cost for poor students.

Guidance for M.P.S.C. and other competition exams is made available free of cost for poor students.
